title: Schema for argument of BackendServices schematics

uri.x-prompt: URL of path (with `file://` protocol) to your OpenAPI source file

domain.description: Business-domain using as a name of grouping directory and Ng-module

project.x-prompt: Name of project in Angular workspace

secondaryEntrypoint.x-prompt: Secondary entrypoint in a project directory (only for libraries!)

hostModule.x-prompt: Path of existing Ng-module has to import generated services
